1.title: In Between Tawk Part I

episode of.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Join Ms. Vampy and her gorgeous tweens and teens, both inside and out, as they talk about "issues", stereotypes, being "popular", "Twilight", Twitter, Justin Bieber and Kim Kardashian West!

episode of.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Join Ms. Vampy and her gorgeous tweens and teens, both inside and out, as they talk about bullying, what's "pretty", self-esteem, "TMZ", "EXTRA" and "American Idol"!

episode of.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Join Ms. Vampy and her gorgeous tweens, both inside and out, as they talk about choices, confidence, courage, following your dreams, "_Glee (2009)_", and Lady Gaga!

4.title: Tween Tawk Part II

episode of.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Join Ms. Vampy and her gorgeous tweens, both inside and out, as they talk about caring what others think, being unique, being judgemental and Demi Lovato!

5.title: Teen Tawk Part I

episode of.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Join Ms. Vampy and her gorgeous teens, both inside and out, as they talk about body image, inner beauty, expressing yourself, "E!", Adam Lambert, Rihanna and Kesha!

6.title: Teen Tawk Part II

episode of.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Join Ms. Vampy and her gorgeous teens, both inside and out, as they talk about facing your fears, following your dreams, decisions, expectations, Taylor Swift, Taylor Lautner, and Lindsay Lohan!

imdb.plot outline: Ms. Vampy is America's funniest, sassiest and most high maintenance vampire! Her personality is as big as her hair and is often described as Betty Boop meets Marisa Tomei in "My Cousin Vinny". She loves pleather and fur and wouldn't be caught "dead" without high heels! But, there's much more to this loveable vampiress from Brooklyn. Following the hit web series "Ms. Vampy" in 2009 and as a prelude to the Halloween Family feature "Vamp It Out", Ms. Vampy is back with "Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk" to inspire tween and teen girls in a "tawk" show format, which covers issues that these girls are faced with today. Discussion topics include: Stereotypes; Body image; Self-esteem; Peer pressure; Caring about what others think of you; Being popular; Facing your fears; Following your dreams; And, of course, boys and "Twilight"!
imdb.title: Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk

Following the hit web series "Ms. Vampy" in 2009 and as a prelude to the Halloween Family feature "Vamp It Out", Ms. Vampy is back with "_Ms. Vampy's Tween Tawk, Teen Tawk & In Between Tawk_ (qv)" to inspire tween and teen girls in a "tawk" show format, which covers issues that these girls are faced with today. Discussion topics include: Stereotypes; Body image; Self-esteem; Peer pressure; Caring about what others think of you; Being popular; Facing your fears; Following your dreams; And, of course, boys and "Twilight"!::Brooke Lewis
